title: I like listening to music, but not with other people. Why is this? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are you listening to music that triggers emotions in yourself? In fact- I would listen to music alone - as being around living people is far better spent talking and listening to each other. Unless discussing musical structure for later compositions? And then there is social music that makes you wanna dance. Are you afraid that the music will make you get up and look silly?

Why? is outside my wisdom. Are you willing to listen to others’ choices? I want to share the music I enjoy…but I read once a teacher should never teach a novel they like. Music would be even worse: deadly to not strike a chord. I litter my Quora answers w/clips as ‘evidence’ of good music, according to Bruce. But, yeah, more than anything I’d hope a gal enjoyed my taste. But…I’d get out to a concert of your choice just to meet-and-greet, maybe you’d find something in common?
